name: Smoked Salmon Rye Bread
description: Classic Finnish smoked salmon on dark rye bread with dill and lemon.

name: Reindeer Sauté
description: Tender reindeer meat sautéed with mushrooms and onions, served with mashed potatoes and lingonberry jam.

name: Handmade Pappardelle with Wild Boar Ragu
description: Slow-cooked wild boar ragu served over fresh, handmade pappardelle pasta.

name: Tiramisu Classico
description: A classic Tiramisu made with authentic mascarpone, espresso-soaked ladyfingers, and a hint of marsala wine.

name: Miso Glazed Black Cod
description: Delicate black cod marinated in a sweet and savory miso glaze, broiled to perfection.

name: Spicy Tuna Crispy Rice
description: Crispy fried rice blocks topped with spicy tuna tartare and a slice of jalapeño.

name: Grilled Halloumi & Watermelon Salad
description: A refreshing summer salad with grilled halloumi, fresh watermelon, mint, and a light vinaigrette.

name: Coq au Vin
description: The quintessential French stew of chicken braised slowly in red wine, mushrooms, and garlic.

name: Crème Brûlée
description: A rich custard base topped with a layer of hardened caramelized sugar.

name: Cochinita Pibil Tacos
description: Slow-roasted pork marinated in citrus and achiote, served on fresh corn tortillas with pickled onions.

name: Lentil Shepherd's Pie
description: A hearty and comforting vegan shepherd's pie with a rich lentil and vegetable filling, topped with creamy mashed potatoes.

name: Quinoa Salad with Roasted Vegetables
description: A vibrant and healthy salad with quinoa, roasted sweet potatoes, broccoli, and a lemon-tahini dressing.

name: Butter Chicken (Murgh Makhani)
description: Tender chicken cooked in a mildly spiced tomato sauce, rich with butter and cream.

name: Chocolate Lava Cake
description: A decadent chocolate cake with a gooey, molten chocolate center, served warm.
